item.title: [PI] Loop help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

@vain

src\server\model\players\Client.java:919: operator ! cannot be applied to int if (!isDonator > 0 && !isExtreme > 0) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:919: operator ! cannot be applied to int if (!isDonator > 0 && !isExtreme > 0) { ^ Note: src\server\world\map\C.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: [PI] Loop help

item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I, post:1, topic:406903”]if (checkVotes(properName)) { int amt = 0, pts = 0; if (isDonator < 1 && isExtreme < 1) { amt = 5000000; pts = 5; } else if (isDonator > 0) { amt = 10000000; pts = 10; } else if (isExtreme > 0) { amt = 15000000; pts = 15; } getItems().addItem(995, amt); lppPoints += pts; }
Also, I do believe the ‘extreme’ and ‘donator’ are a player ‘right’[/quote]

Your coding is far too advanced for these forums

item.title: [PI] Loop help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

src\server\model\players\Client.java:919: cannot find symbol symbol : variable o location: class server.model.players.Client o.lppPoints += 5; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:921: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.players.Client if (c.isDonator == 1) { ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:923: cannot find symbol symbol : variable o location: class server.model.players.Client o.lppPoints += 10; ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:924: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class server.model.players.Client } else if (c.isExtreme == 1) ^ src\server\model\players\Client.java:926: cannot find symbol symbol : variable o location: class server.model.players.Client o.lppPoints += 15; ^ Note: src\server\world\map\C.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Im guessing its right? but how am i getting these errors with the symbols when its used in playerassistant.java

item.title: [PI] Loop help
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

This is completely wrong, but i need some guidance on how to do it right, if you know please post ++

Make it so that when you log in, if your c.isDonator == 1 you get better stuff, and if your c.isExtreme you get even more better things

if(checkVotes(playerName)) { getItems().addItem(995, 5000000); o.lppPoints += 5; sendMessage("Thanks for voting today!"); } if (c.isDonator == 1) { getItems().addItem(995, 10000000); o.lppPoints += 10; } else if (c.isExtreme == 1) getItems().addItem(995, 15000000); o.lppPoints += 15; return; }

Read full topic
